about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full-stack Developer & Cybersecurity Expert
about.description: With years of experience in building secure, scalable, and beautiful web applications, I specialize in full-stack development and cybersecurity. Whether it's crafting elegant UIs with React and Tailwind or securing applications against OWASP Top 10 threats, I bring a deep passion for clean code and secure architecture. Currently based in Portugal, I help businesses launch fast, reliable, and safe platforms â€” from frontend interfaces to backend logic and automated security tools.
